resources.string: This app reads weight from a scale, using the camera, then writes the resulting weight into Android Health Connect. It only does so when the app is active.
This app does not read any data from Health Connect.
When used with debug mode disabled, this app does not store any weight data (raw image or processed number) by itself. All of the weight data is stored, on your device, by the Health Connect service.
If you wish to delete data generated by this app, please follow steps provided on Health Connect help pages.

When debug mode is enabled, and the "Save images (debug)" menu item is pressed, this app will save the last few captured images on your device (which may include the readout weight). These images are easily viewed in any image viewer (e.g. Google Photos), and can be deleted there.
Keep scale number within the red boxes.\n Digits should be at least as tall as the inner rectangle, but not taller than the outer one.
